column5: Anyone know where I can get unpainted ultra minnow jig heads?  Looking for 50-100 of them.  I would prefer to get them in Canada.  I have found light ones, I am looking for 5/8-3/4oz
Really, I can only find the molds, not the jigs themselves, maybe I am missing something.  Can you shoot me a link?
You're RIGHT! I just checked. It was the ultra minnow spinnerbait heads that I'd seen. You can call Steve or Helene though and see what they say.
No wonder I am having a hard time, so is everyone else!
Theres a place here in Montreal but not sure if he is still opened. http://www.lcdistributions.com/index.htm
Not really been any demand for the much larger jig sizes for freshwater fishing.
Unless ofcourse you fish the Detroit River!
I cast minnow jigs for folks fishing the Niagara, and they usually ask for 3/8 or 1/2, so I've never gotten the larger mold.
Bigugli, how much do you charge for your ultra minnow jigs?
order from these guys every year about 500-1000 jig heads...good quality and cheap
bigugli, thanks for the quick reply, good to know where I can get 1/4 & 3/80z as I only have the bigger mold.
